name: DIE DIE (Demo)
description:
DIE DIE

By  BennyK and Teagan

For the PIGSquad 2019 Summer Slow Jam - "3- Button, 3-Color" Jam - "One More Time!"

This is a tech demo of a game about "rotating" a cube and solving a puzzle on each side. There is one level for this demo: a Snake-like side, a infinite-runner side, a Simon Says side, and a pipe puzzle side.

The controls and style are emulated to be like the upcoming Playdate by Panic.

Controls:

B - Left Mouse (Action)

A- Right Mouse (Action)

Scroll Wheel - Crank (Scroll through games)

Snake: B + A: Rotate left and right

Infinite Runner: B: Jump and Double Jump

Simons Says and Pipes: B: Move Cursor. A: Select.
